attributes.action: Get children from same family into same schools
attributes.additional_details: It's a joke that family have to take two children to different schools Miles apart
attributes.background: Make it easy  for family to get all kids into same school as older siblings

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The admission criteria for schools are set by individual schools or local authorities.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can find out more about school admissions, including how to appeal a decision on the UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/schools-admissions/admissions-criteria
